text: Arsenio Lope Huerta (15 November 1943 - 2 January 2021) was a Spanish lawyer, politician, writer and economist. He was born in Alcalá de Henares, Spain. Lope Huerta was a member of the Spanish Socialist Workers' Party. From 1983 to 1987, he was Mayor of Alcalá de Henares. In 1988 he was the civil governor of León. In 1990 he was the delegate of the Government in Castilla y León. He also worked at the University of Alcalá. Lope Huerta died on 2 January 2021 in Alcalá de Henares at the age of 77.Fallece Arsenio Lope Huerta, delegado del Gobierno en Castilla y León durante la etapa de Felipe González Arsenio Lope Huerta (Amparo Vargas 2001) retrato.png| Andrés Bonilla Gutiérrez (RPS 09-07-2023) Arsenio Lope Huerta, estatua.png| ==References== Category:1943 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Spanish politicians Category:Spanish historians Category:Spanish economists Category:Spanish lawyers
